Text: CounterParty Name ChangePST Kam I see your name on SITARA so I am requesting help in getting the counterparty named changed from PEOPLES GAS COMPANY to THE PEOPLES GAS LIGHT COKE COMPANY Please give me a call on Fri morning Thanks Doug x

FW Real CounterpartyPST Hello Cora and Kam Kay says below in response to my email below that the deals shown should be PGE Energy Trading Gas Corporation If either of you can please make the change in SITARA If someone else needs to do this please let me know Thanks for the help Doug Original Message From Classen Kay Sent Tuesday February AM To Nelson Doug Subject RE Real Counterparty They are suppose to be pge energy trading I think I stopped using them when we figured out that I had messed up in December I think Cora or Cam fixed it last month Original Message From Nelson Doug Sent Monday February PM To Classen Kay Subject Real Counterparty Kay Please look at deals for Jan should they be with PGE Energy Trading Gas Corporation Or is PGE National Energy Group Inc correct Please advise Thanks Doug x
